title: About
text: Life and writings of Spencer Irvine : 13 Feb 1988 - 24 Sep 2023

title: Spencer Reed Irvine
text:
The Lord will never lead us astray and He is always with us. - Spencer, 21 Sep 2023


夫唯弗居, 是以不去 (머무르지 않으니, 떠나지도 않는다)1 - 道德經, Chapter 2, ~ 400 B.C., before Christ


Always in our Hearts
